Description_lang: You disperse into pure Shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by $47585s1%.  You are unable to attack or cast spells, but you regenerate $49766s1% mana every 1 sec for $d. Dispersion can be cast while stunned, feared or silenced and clears all snare and movement impairing effects when cast, and makes you immune to them while dispersed.
AuraDescription_lang: Reduces all damage by $s1%, and you regenerate $s2% mana every $60069t1 sec for $d.  Cannot attack or cast spells. Immune to snare and movement impairing effects.
